ProjectTitle: Reanimating Morgue Files. A Media Archeology of Reference Picture Collections
InitialFeedbackHistory:
09/07/2024
Have you registered the use of personal data via a PRET application? Please mention the approval number in the DMP.  Make sure processing of personal data is approved before starting with the interviews, for more information see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index. 
You also mention open sharing of the interview data, how will you make sure these are fully anonymous before sharing? If not fully anonymous, please apply access restrictions in KU Leuven RDR, als best to contact the RDR team before uploading the morgue file dataset to make sure to avoid copyright infringement https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
My colleagues form artes library informed me that the PhD candidate working on this project will follow the digital scholarship course in the fall, best to update your DMP together after this course and submit as intermediate. If you like to discuss your DMP with the RDM support staff earlier you can make an appointment via this link: https://outlook.office365.com/book/ArtesResearch@KULeuven.onmicrosoft.com/
label: intermediate DMP needed
